channel.title: SAP on Microsoft on SAP on Microsoft - Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in SAP on Microsoft on SAP on Microsoft - Tutorials

item.title: Environment Setup
item.description: Before we start building our labs we need to have provisioned a few resources: An Azure subscription setup An S/4HANA environment Installation of gateway components The following sections will guide you thru the steps to accomplish this and be ready to the labs.

item.title: SAP on Microsoft Labs
item.description: The following sections will be divided in different labs integrating several Microsoft services with SAP, such as: Automation and Integration Azure Logic Apps Power Platform - Power Virtual Agents Power Platform - Power Automate Power Platform - Power Apps Data & AI Office 365 Integration Azure Synapse Power Platform - Power BI Azure Machine Learning Security Azure Sentinel Azure AD Infra & Management Azure Monitoring Azure Backup High-Availability The following sections will guide you thru the steps to accomplish this and be ready to the labs.
